page.title: 11A TYPICAL CHILD'S SATURDAY
page.content: On Saturday, I wake up about 7 o'clock. I go downstairs and let the cat in then I switch on the T.V. I have my breakfast and get dressed. Then I watch T.V. again for a little while. After this I go out to play with Paul and Mark on the Ham. When I go home to dinner I have beefburgers and chips and then I go with my family down to the town and walk around the shops. At teatime we have beens on toast and after tea we watch T.V. At about 9pm. I wash and clean my teeth, put on my pyjamas and go to bed. I read a book for a little while until mum and dad come in to say goodnight and then I go to sleep.
